verbs.description: [ARG0: Republican Senator John McCain ( Ariz. )] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [V: issued] [ARG1: a stunning rebuke of President Trump 's threat to impose new tariffs on Canada and pulling his endorsement of a joint communique signed with other Group of Seven ( G-7 ) members at this weekend 's summit] .

Republican Senator John McCain ( Ariz. ) on Saturday issued a stunning rebuke of [ARG0: President Trump 's] threat to [V: impose] [ARG1: new tariffs on Canada] and pulling his endorsement of a joint communique signed with other Group of Seven ( G-7 ) members at this weekend 's summit .
